items.name: Multiattack
entries: Zariel attacks twice with her flail and once with Matalotok. She can substitute Horrid Touch for Matalotok.

items.name: Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) piercing damage plus 36 ({@damage 8d8}) fire damage.

items.name: Matalotok (Warhammer)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) bludgeoning, or 19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands, plus 36 ({@damage 8d8}) fire damage. In addition, the weapon emits a burst of cold that deals 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage to each creature within 30 feet of it.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered
